title: OXO Corn Holders
description: Enjoy a hot ear of corn the safe and easy way with the OXO SteeL Corn Holders. Our Corn Holders come as a set of eight and feature strong, stainless steel pins with soft, oversized, non-slip handles that are non-slip, even when your hands are buttery.

asset.title: OXO Corn Holders
asset.description:
http://www.oxo.com/p-828-corn-holders.aspx

Enjoy a hot ear of corn the safe and easy way with the OXO SteeL Corn Holders. Our Corn Holders come as a set of eight and feature strong, stainless steel pins with soft, oversized, non-slip handles that are non-slip, even when your hands are buttery.
asset.author: OXO

transcripts: At OXO we love solving pet peeves. So if you've ever buttered an ear of corn, and you found it too slippery to hold on to, you'll appreciate these corn holders. The OXO steel corn holders are a comfortable alternative to holding a hot ear of corn with bare hands. Our corn holders come as a set of eight and feature strong sharp stainless steel pins. Soft nonslip handles are over-sized and won't slip or slide in buttery hands. Their durable and effective and they feature attractive tabletop friendly stainless steel accents. Here's a good tip. These corn holders are also great for piercing potatoes before baking
